causes: Title VII (including PDA), 42 U.S.C.  ยง 2000e

case_data.name: EEOC v. Transcontinental Title, Inc.
case_data.plaintiff_description: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, on behalf of one or more workers.
settlement_agreement: Court Approved Settlement or Consent Decree
case_data.summary: The Memphis office of the EEOC brought this action in the Eastern District of Tennessee, against Transcontinental Title, Inc. The complaint was filed in April 2001 and in September 2003 the parties settled. The parties entered a consent decree the following day. The only document that we have for this case is the docket, which suggests that the case was brought under Title VII.
